command_line: export BCFTOOLS_PLUGINS=`which bcftools | sed 's,bin/bcftools,libexec/bcftools,'`;     bgzip -c '/galaxy/server/database/objects/5/a/2/dataset_5a2cf058-df66-4558-8e19-2bb7430a39c8.dat' > input.vcf.gz && bcftools index input.vcf.gz &&        bcftools call  -m --prior 0.0011        --regions-overlap 1           --variants-only    --output-type 'v'   --threads ${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}    input.vcf.gz  > '/galaxy/server/database/objects/c/0/1/dataset_c01d3284-e527-4e36-b0f4-bac3da23b78e.dat'
